name: @alexrah/ssh-watch-upload-webpack-plugin
description: [Forked - published on NPM under @alexrah namespace] A webpack plugin that watches your changed files and uploads the newly compiled assets to an external server via SSH
author: Daniel Lerman <dev@dlerman.com> (https://github.com/dlerm), Alessandro Stoppato <alexrah@gmail.com> (https://github.com/alexrah)
